title: Call of the Wolf
description: Two sensuous werewolf romances come together in an omnibus edition containing Secret of the Wolf, in which a tormented Quentin Forster, plagued by spells of amnesia, comes to hypnotist Johanna Schell for help, and To Catch a Wolf, in which crippled Denver socialite Athena Munroe attends a traveling circus and finds herself drawn to werewolf Morgan Holt, who holds the key to her own incredible destiny. Original. 25,000 first printing.
author: Susan Krinard
